name: Synchronicity (Valtera Games)
description:
Left click on the puzzles in the corners of the screen to solve them (with WASD). You cannot move the pharaoh in the center puzzle, but he will copy the moves of the corner puzzles. Solve all 5 puzzles to win! @GamesValtera

Space - Return to "overview" from a corner puzzle

Escape - Reset the entire level

Hint: Try to leave corner puzzles unsolved, so that you can use them to realign the other puzzles.
